book:
The Chemistry Development Kit (CDK) A Java library for Computational Chemistry and Chemoinformatics
The author is Assistant Professor of Chemistry at the Chemoinformatics Workgroup @ University of Notre Dan Notre Dame, IN, USA.
Dan Gezelter
The author is head of the Chemoinformatics Workgroup @ The Max Planck Institute of Chemical Ecology in Jena, Germany. He enjoys running, cooking, eating and classic as well as all kinds of other well made music. He plays flute and piano.
Christoph Steinbeck
The author is a student of chemistry at the University of Nijmegen in the Netherlands.
Egon Willighagen
Max Planck Institute of Chemical Ecology Carl-Zeiss-Promenade 10D-07745Jenasteinbeck@ice.mpg.de+49(0)3641-643644+49(0)3641-643665Germany
